text:
Remember The Girl Who Played Young Kareena AKA Poo In K3G? She Is All Set To Make Her...
2.1 K SHARES
title: Remember The Girl Who Played Young Kareena AKA Poo In K3G? She Is All Set To Make Her Debut
description: But do you remember the girl who played the young Kareena? The one who would always tease her friend Rohan (young Hrithik Roshan). “Chandu ke chacha ne chandu ki chachi ko chandni raat per chandni Chowk mein Chandi ki chamach se chatni chata” – this must have rung a bell to you! Her name is Malvika Raaj and she is now all grown up and is also all set to make her debut.
